CmdLine: curl https://codeload.github.com/ImageMagick/ImageMagick/tar.gz/7.0.7-11 -o /tmp/ImageMagick-7.0.7-11.tar.gz   && cd /tmp   && tar xvzf ImageMagick-7.0.7-11.tar.gz   && cd ImageMagick-7.0.7-11   && ./configure   && make   && make install   && ldconfig /usr/local/lib   && cd - && rm -Rf /tmp/ImageMagick*
Commands.Name: run
